properties.areaDesc: Christian, KY; Trigg, KY; Todd, KY
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 3 at 2:14AM CST until March 3 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Southern Christian County in south central Kentucky...
Southern Trigg County in western Kentucky...
Southern Todd County in south central Kentucky...

* Until 1215 PM CST Tuesday.

* At 213 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain across the warned area. Up to two inches of rain have
already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin
shortly. Additional thunderstorms are expected impact the warned
area.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Clarksville...                    Oak Grove...
Guthrie...                        Pembroke...
Trenton...                        Lafayette...
Fort Campbell North...            Allensville...
Linton...                         Herndon...
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
